ProductInfo.Features:
Monitor and record up to 8 cameras with all the features of the amazing, industry-leading and#8220;artificial intelligenceand#8221; security DVR, including a pre-installed Seagate 250 GB HDD
4 Maxi Day/Night Cams have high resolution 420 TV Lines CCD video display, aluminum case with sunshield, indoor / outdoor, powerful day / night vision up to 65feet (20m) and more
Easy to upgrade with 4 more Maxi Day/Night Cams or up to 4 other Swann Professional Security Cameras
Kit includes all cables, connectors and everything you need to get started
Perfect for business, medium-sized retail security; large homes, law enforcement, schools and more
